headline: American Electric Power (AEP) Plans $70 Billion Capital Expenditures Through 2029, Analyst Boosts Target
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) ranks among the best performing utilities stocks to buy now. Ladenburg Thalmann maintained its Neutral rating on American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) and boosted its price target from $109 to $112 on August 18. The price target rise is in line with AEP’s larger capital expenditures, which were […]
